actionable_tasks.title: Implement Circuit Breaker Pattern for Provider Failover
actionable_tasks.description: Add a circuit breaker mechanism to the backend provider selection logic to automatically failover to alternate LLM providers when error rates or latency exceed thresholds.
implementation_steps: Create a new module (circuitBreaker.js) implementing the circuit breaker logic (open/close/trip states, error/latency thresholds).
Integrate the circuit breaker into providerManager.js to wrap provider calls.
Update providers.js API endpoints to report circuit breaker status.
Add basic unit tests for the circuit breaker logic.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Request Correlation IDs for End-to-End Tracing
actionable_tasks.description: Attach a unique correlation ID to each incoming request and propagate it through backend services for improved traceability and debugging.
implementation_steps: Create a utility to generate and attach correlation IDs to requests (using middleware).
Ensure all logs and downstream service calls include the correlation ID.
Update documentation to describe correlation ID usage.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage
actionable_tasks.description: Increase automated test coverage for critical backend modules, focusing on provider switching and chat pipeline logic.
implementation_steps: Identify untested code paths in provider switching and chat pipeline modules.
Write and run new Jest tests to cover these paths.
Update coverage reports and address any failing tests.

actionable_tasks.title: Optimize Docker Builds with Multi-Stage and Caching
actionable_tasks.description: Refactor Dockerfiles for backend and frontend to use multi-stage builds and improved layer caching for faster, smaller builds.
implementation_steps: Update Dockerfiles to use multi-stage builds (separate build and runtime stages).
Optimize layer ordering for maximum cache reuse.
Test build and deployment locally to verify improvements.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement MongoDB TTL Indexes for Telemetry Data Rotation
actionable_tasks.description: Add TTL (Time-To-Live) indexes to MongoDB collections storing telemetry data to automatically expire old records and manage storage.
implementation_steps: Add TTL index creation logic to initIndexes.js.
Test that expired records are automatically removed.
